metadata.title: CVE-2019-14847 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in samba 4.0.0 before samba 4.9.15 and samba 4.10.x before4.10.10. An attacker can crash AD DC LDAP server via dirsync resulting indenial of service. Privilege escalation is not possible with this issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14847` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss-winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
libpam-smbpass - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
libpam-winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
libparse-pidl-perl - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
libsmbclient - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
libsmbsharemodes0 - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
libwbclient0 - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
python-samba - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
registry-tools - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
samba - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
samba-common - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
samba-common-bin - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
samba-libs - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
samba-testsuite - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
smbclient - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
winbind - 2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: samba package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.3.11+dfsg-0ubuntu0.14.04.20+esm3').
